CustomField.formula: IF( GC_Sales_target_this_year__c <> 0, image("http://chart.apis.google.com/chart?cht=gom&chd=t:"&TEXT(100 * GC_Sold_2010__c / GC_Sales_target_this_year__c )&"&chs=200x75&chco=CCCCCC,236FBD&chl=","Sales vs target"), image("http://chart.apis.google.com/chart?cht=gom&chco=CCCCCC,236FBD&chd=t:"&TEXT(0 )&"&chs=200x75&chl=","Sales vs target"))
CustomField.label: Sales vs target
